WorkItem.Description:
A minor defect, but one that irks the test-infected :
The test method ObservableObjectTest.InvalidPropertyNameIsReported fails in the Release build : indeed it is testing a feature that is documented as belonging only in Debug builds !
That method should thus probably be surrounded with #if(DEBUG)/#endif or tagged with some equivalent attribute.
Â 
I'll finish by hijacking this issue ticket to say thanks a lot for sharing all the good stuff on WPF for all this time ! :)

Comments.Message: D'oh!  Thanks for pointing that out.  I'll fix it soon.
